titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the costs of property designed specifically for handicapped and elderly individuals as a trade or business deduction.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/21/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow as an income tax deduction the cost of acquiring or modifying property which is used in a trade or business and is specifically designed to enhance the employability and productivity of handicapped and elderly individuals.
